mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_res_role (id_, system_id_, res_id_, role_id_) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{systemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select b.*, a.alias_ resAlias, c.code roleAlias, a.url_ url from sys_resource a left join sys_res_role b on a.id_ = b.res_id_ left join sys_role c on b.role_id_ = c.id where c.available = TRUE and a.enable_ = 1

select b.*, a.alias_ resAlias, c.code roleAlias, a.url_ url from sys_resource a left join sys_res_role b on a.id_ = b.res_id_ left join sys_role c on b.role_id_ = c.id where c.id = #{roleId} and c.available = TRUE and a.enable_ = 1
